text:
UNIVERSITY OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA
UNIVERSITY PARK
LOS ANGELES 7
May 20, 1959
Mr, William Harley, President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Broadcasting Stations WHA
University of Wisconsin
Madison, Wisconsin
Dear Bill,
Just a note of thanks for your kindness in advising me and in
smoothing the way for my understanding of UAEB board affairs. It is
an honor to have your guidance, and I look forward to justifying that
honor as fully as I am able.
Cordially,
kh:mk
Kenneth Harwood, Chairman
Department of Telecommunications
